response_parsed.title: Harden Cron-Driven Tasks Using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer demonstrates how to strengthen the security of cron-driven tasks by integrating them with FastAPI, a modern web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+.

Run cron jobs as FastAPI endpoints with proper authentication and authorization
Leverage the power of dependency injection for modular and testable code
Implement rate limiting and other security measures for protecting against abuse
